Name: {G.QUERY.ADID}
Description: adid = The advertising ID ('in the clear'), a 32 char GUID

Name: {G.QUERY.MKT}
Description: mkt = Internal MS data, a 6 char string (to be sent on the post-back)

Name: {G.QUERY.ASID}
Description: bclid = Click ID; Internal MS data, a 32 char GUID (to be sent on the post-back)

Name: {G.QUERY.SAPPID}
Description: sappid = Creative; Internal MS data, a 32 char GUID (to be sent on the post-back)

Name: {G.QUERY.PG}
Description: pg = Sub publisher (site/ app ID); Internal MS data, a 20 char string (to be sent on the post-back)

Name: {G.QUERY.PID}
Description: pid = Campaign ID; Internal MS data, a 32 char GUID (to be sent on the post-back)

Name: {G.QUERY.CID}
Description: cid = Ad creative ID; Internal MS data, a 32 char GUID (to be sent on the post-back)
